title: BANNED... for flaming myself
body:
Heya, studs.

I was playing a game of League of Legends with my two buddies. I died a couple of times and started flaming. The best part is that the flame wasn`t aimed towards anyone but **myself**, i just had to burst out a bit to let myself cool down a bit. Afterwards I was talking with** my friends** and talking shit with **them** and not _TOWARDS ANYONE._


Is there any chance that "cool" rito will un-ban my acc? I actually _don`t even believe_ that, just curious if there is even a chance.



PS. Even if something was aimed at the enemy team, they had no way of reading it, since i was writing only in team-chat.

replies.body:
Would like to see the chat logs before commenting on your case specifically.

But if you want to talk to a Riot support person, who actually has the power to review & change the ban (if they deem it necessary) your best bet is a support ticket, not the boards.

Your "friends" reported you. ðŸ˜‚ ðŸ˜‚ ðŸ˜‚

90%
Post your chat logs and was it a premade 5 man or were there random people in your party?

It happened a long time ago, but now they have a rule about "negative language that derails the game" even if doesn't specifically break a rule. If people are reporting you, it shows that you made their experience worse, so Riot would probably uphold the punishment. 

this is in a general sense without seeing exactly what you did.

"negative language" is so  vague it can mean literally anything. At this point, Riot is  handing out bans like candy to anyone they don't like, and trusting the other players to be fair. They're not. Trolls issue reports too, you know. Do you trust the trolls to be honest? 

And 'derailing the game'? Riot doesn't watch the games. At best someone looks at a one sided chat log. Give me a break. This company is shady as hell.

if they ban all the players then they would have no player base /customers and the game wouldnt exist  

think before you speak

Riot doesn't give a damn about fairness. They want to be the word police but won't actually outline rules. They want to be able to ban whoever they want for whatever reason. I am getting very sick of the communism in this game. Not to mention the CHEAT math. Items don't give what they're labeled to, in terms of stats, and I don't think it's an accident at this point.

I think Riot is cheating us across the board, possibly even giving 'honorably' players phantom buffs and penalized players phantom nerfs. The math literally doesn't add up in game, and their death reports are almost always wrong...yet they don't fix it. Like some sick joke against those of us who can actually run the math through our heads.

seriously stfu

you have no clue what you are talking about
Uh oh. You just said STFU. Does that deserve a ban?
well if it does it dont stop me from playing the game

you are accusing riot of something that is hard-to-do.
items ALWAYS give the stats they state (-/+ depending if your character gains stats from other stats)
they outlined rules in the TOS, learn to read.

death reports are fucking stupid, they aren't really realistic.
deserved. self defamation is still toxic.
well if you were only typing it in team chat then the others who werent your friends didnt like what you were saying and reported you. is it a 14 day ban or a perma ban?
Support ticket. They can't do anything from the forums. Submit a ticket if you think the ban was unjustified.

First off, like Hammermancer asked; we'd need to see your chat logs to evaluate what may have resulted in your punishment.

Second; _were you in a full, five-man premade with players who were fine with your behavior_, or did you have any random players on your team?
